Articles.Content: Whenever I use the premade carrier it drops into the water and then just tips to the right untill it is nearly upsidedown. I am using other mods so it might be a conflict.
i love you modders! (full homo intended)

Whenever I use the premade carrier it drops into the water and then just tips to the right untill it is nearly upsidedown. I am using other mods so it might be a conflict.

Getting the same thing here, it starts in a slow roll to starboard.

That having been said its still awesome and im playing with the gizmos as it sinks!!! =)

Edited June 16, 2013 by KhaosCorp

Whenever I use the premade carrier it drops into the water and then just tips to the right untill it is nearly upsidedown. I am using other mods so it might be a conflict.

That is strange, let's see if others have the same issue. Only a drop from very high would cause it to flood like that. Go into the R3CarrierConTower part and edit the cfg variable like this: (change the altitude to 3 perhaps.)

MODULE

{

name= BoatInterface

moveAtLaunch = true

addLongitude = 0.4

altitude = 6

hornActive = true

}

That is strange, let's see if others have the same issue. Only a drop from very high would cause it to flood like that.

It is dropping from 3 meters up I think, anyway im downloading a clean KSP to try it with and see if its a confliction.

That is strange, let's see if others have the same issue. Only a drop from very high would cause it to flood like that.

Do you by chance use EditorTools mod? I do, maybe its different in SPH size?

edit: also curious if you use FAR Infinite?
Ah, found the guide, had to open the thread on Chrome, Firefox apparently wasn't liking it ;P Now! Let the madness begin! (And many thanks for such an awesome mod :3)

K guys I'll be updating the download... the altitude on the con tower needs to be set to 2. Please do so, and it works fine.

The issue with this was... I did some parts re-balancing before I packed it up. Some weights changed, mostly increased. This seems to have affected the momentum of the carrier... So instead of re-downloading the whole thing just change the altitude as I show above in the con tower part... and it will be fine.

That is strange, let's see if others have the same issue. Only a drop from very high would cause it to flood like that. Go into the R3CarrierConTower part and edit the cfg variable like this: (change the altitude to 3 perhaps.)

MODULE

{

name= BoatInterface

moveAtLaunch = true

addLongitude = 0.4

altitude = 6

hornActive = true

}

this worked for me, thanks ID and the entire boat team!!!!! LET THE NAVAL OPS ENSUE!!!
People better use that horn!
I found out it was not a conflict since it happened on a clean instal but setting the alt to 3 made it work fine. Thanks for the help.

People better use that horn!
